subject: Order #SSN2789
description_text:
Hello!

On September 30th I've ordered the Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals and on 
your shipping info site it says that it usually takes 9-15 days to ship. 
It's now been 8 days and I haven't even received a shipping confirmation 
mail yet. Is this expected?

Thank you for your time!

Max

conversations.body_text: Hi thwoawya,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped, and here is your tracking link:  https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326626373DE&cid=c_dhl_2502061_2353
